body_html: Configure does not free memory as far as I can tell (it certainly doesn't deregister it from XRT, so I can pass it to another execute and it'll do something - I haven't verified whether the underlying memory sticks around). I do also want a more lightweight Op. While we're at it, I'd also like a more lightweight op to interrupt a running XRTExecute run (our models tend to look like state machines in a while loop on the device, side, so if that gets in a bad state, it can be hard to kill).
